pkmkdoc.description: Installs a platform for developing firmware for AVR microcontrollers. Includes 64-bit gcc toolchain, avrdude, and a project template.

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf350 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This installer will install a platform for Xcode allowing Xcode to be used for developing AVR micro controller firmware.\ \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b \cf0 REQUIRES 64-bit \b0 \ \
\b NOTE \b0 : This is beta software and extending Xcode isn't documented so use at your own risk!}
